REGISTER.TITLE: Register
REGISTER.TESTIMONIAL_HEADER: All it takes is one step to move forward
REGISTER.TESTIMONIAL_CONTENT: You're one step away from engaging your customers, retaining them and finding new ones.
REGISTER.TERMS_ACCEPT: By signing up, you agree to our T & C and Privacy Policy

COMPANY_NAME.LABEL: Company name
COMPANY_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Enter your company name. E.g., Wayne Enterprises

FULL_NAME.LABEL: Full name
FULL_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Enter your full name. E.g., Bruce Wayne

EMAIL.LABEL: Work email
EMAIL.PLACEHOLDER: Enter your work email address. E.g., bruce{'@'}wayne{'.'}enterprises
EMAIL.ERROR: Please enter a valid work email address.

PASSWORD.LABEL: Password
PASSWORD.IS_INVALID_PASSWORD: Password should contain atleast 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 number and 1 special character.
PASSWORD.NOT_UPPERCASE: Password should contain atleast 1 uppercase letter.
PASSWORD.NOT_LOWERCASE: Password should contain atleast 1 lowercase letter.
PASSWORD.NOT_SPECIAL_CHARACTER: Password should contain atleast 1 special character.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not connect to Woot server. Please try again.

INBOX_ADD_AGENTS.TITLE: Agents
INBOX_ADD_AGENTS.DESC: Here you can add agents to manage your newly created inbox. Only these selected agents will have access to your inbox. Agents which are not part of this inbox will not be able to see or respond to messages in this inbox when they login.
INBOX_ADD_AGENTS.VALIDATION_ERROR: Add at least one agent to your new Inbox

ADD_AGENT.TITLE: Add agent to your team
ADD_AGENT.DESC: You can add people who will be able to handle support for your inboxes.

NAME.LABEL: Agent Name
NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Please enter a name of the agent

EMAIL.LABEL: Email Address
EMAIL.PLACEHOLDER: Please enter an email address of the agent
EMAIL.ERROR: Please enter a valid work email address.

API.EXIST_MESSAGE: Agent email already in use, Please try another email address
API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not connect to Woot Server, Please try again later

PROFILE.TITLE: Set up profile
PROFILE.BODY: These are details visible to end users, to make a positive first impression.

SUBMIT.ERROR: Error in setting up profile, try again.
SUBMIT.SUCCESS: ðŸ”¥ Lets add your business details

DISPLAY_NAME.LABEL: Display name
DISPLAY_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Enter the name you want to display your customers
DISPLAY_NAME.ERROR: Add a valid display name or leave it blank

SIGNATURE.LABEL: Signature
SIGNATURE.PLACEHOLDER: Add a signature for your messages. You can set this later in your settings.

COMPANY.TITLE: Tell us about your company
COMPANY.BODY: In this section, we'll set up the language, timezone, and company size. This information allows us to provide contextually accurate information and suggest relevant features for you.

SUBMIT.ERROR: Error in setting up company, try again.

TIMEZONE.LABEL: Timezone
TIMEZONE.PLACEHOLDER: What timezone do you work from?

LOCALE.LABEL: Language
LOCALE.PLACEHOLDER: Select the language you want to use

SIZE.LABEL: Company size
SIZE.PLACEHOLDER: How many people work at your company?

INVITE_TEAM.TITLE: Invite your team
INVITE_TEAM.BODY: Invite your team members to Chatwoot. You can add them later as well.

SUBMIT.ERROR: Error while inviting team members, try again.
SUBMIT.NO_MEMBER_ERROR: Please add atleast one team member or skip this step
